name: Amexio Dialogue
description: A Simple dialogue which renders various prompts like Confirmation/Alert based on type, title, body user has configured.

properties.name: footer-align
properties.description: Alignment of footer contents to right or left.

properties.name: button-size
properties.description: Different Sizes of Buttons availabe : large, default, small & xsmall

properties.name: content-align
properties.description: Alignment of  contents to right or left or center.

properties.name: close-on-escape
properties.description: Dialogue box closes on click of Escape Key.

properties.name: show
properties.description: uses two way binding to Show / Hide Dialogue.

properties.name: material-design
properties.description: user doesn't want header background color then user can use  material-design is equal to true

properties.name: type
properties.description: Mode to open, alert or dialogue mode.

properties.name: primary-action-label
properties.description: Label to be displayed for primary action.

properties.name: secondary-action-label
properties.description: Label to be displayed for secondary action.

events.name: actionStatus
events.description: Fire when click on yes or no button
